io.sphere.sdk.products

Interface AttributeContainer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProductVariant

    public interface AttributeContainer
    A container for attributes. This can be either a product variant or nested attribute.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> java.util.Optional<T> getAttribute(AttributeGetter<T> accessor)
      Access one attribute of a specific name and type which is known in the first place, consult AttributeGetterSetter how to implement these.
      default java.util.Optional<Attribute> getAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName) 
      java.util.List<Attribute> getAttributes() 
      default boolean hasAttribute(AttributeGetter<?> getter) 
      default boolean hasAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName) 
      static AttributeContainer of(java.util.List<Attribute> attributes) 

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributes

        java.util.List<Attribute> getAttributes()

      • getAttribute

        <T> java.util.Optional<T> getAttribute(AttributeGetter<T> accessor)
        Access one attribute of a specific name and type which is known in the first place, consult AttributeGetterSetter how to implement these.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the underlying type of the attribute
        Parameters:
        accessor - declaration of the name and type of the attribute
        Returns:
        the value of the attribute, or Optional.empty if absent
        Throws:
        JsonException - if the type of attribute cannot be parsed

      • hasAttribute

        default boolean hasAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName)
